channel.title: Exodus Development Team Recruiting (New Application Page)
channel.description:
:D Welcome, To The Exodus Development Team Apps! :D
Exodus was found and created by me Ex and i have been waiting for the time to make a development team. Me, and two fellow friends (Owned, and Furkan) Stepped in and said they would help with anything that stands in there way.
We First started this Team two days ago on 10/20/07 and we are hopping to get this development team up and going good. We are a reliable team and will help anyone with anything they need, and we will not back stab anyone.
Rules for posting: -Dont Spam -Dont Advertise -Dont Flame
We currently have a new starting area, starter cloth, shops, training, pk area, commands, wc, and rc, and alot more. We are fixing all weapons and we are trying to fix all skills to be as good as the real runescape as possible.
We currently have the following positions open: (If it doesnt say spot open, then its full!)
Owner: Ex
Co-Owner: Owned
Forum Administrators: Ex
Forum Moderator: Spot Open Spot Open
Game Admin: Furkan Spot Open
Game Mod: Spot Open Spot Open
Coders:Ex Spot Open
No-IP Hosters: Owned
Testers: Spot Open Spot Open Spot Open
That is all for now, and if you are not active for 2 weeks you will be warned, then in 4 weeks you will be kicked from the Development Team. Only Me and Owned can Accept applications.
Applications:
[code] Game Name: Job wanted: Experience In this job: How active are you: Email: Anything else about you: [/code]
Fill the application out to join and if you pm or email me then i will delete the messenge... it must me Filled out here!
:D :D :D :D :D

item.description:
@dog_eats_dog wrote:

Please don’t post something that is still alive on the end of this page, If you want changes edit it, Or get someone to post a reply to it.

Read full topic
